segments.text: I see the boy standing on that stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he must really love cookies to go through all this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, but he's not giving up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies he's planning to take, and if he's going to share with his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's being so brave, standing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to be so proud of himself when he finally gets those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, but I can't help admiring his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a bold move, and I'm excited to see if he pulls it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to be a hero to his sister if he gets those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
